mapper.update: update WISDOM.MPS set TASKNO = #{taskno,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROCESSFILENO = #{processfileno,jdbcType=CHAR}, MANUNUMBER = #{manunumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, STARTDATE = #{startdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, ENDDATE = #{enddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, URGENT = #{urgent,jdbcType=CHAR} where MPSNO = #{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select MPSNO, TASKNO, PROCESSFILENO, MANUNUMBER, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, DEPARTMENT, STATUS, TYPE, URGENT from WISDOM.MPS where MPSNO = #{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}
select MPSNO, TASKNO, PROCESSFILENO, MANUNUMBER, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, DEPARTMENT, STATUS, TYPE, URGENT from WISDOM.MPS
